bRUDUx-s5.memHandModelNotes:
In winter feeds mainly in open water. ***Isolate Large wetlands with wet veg or NWI and select only those pixels that fall within. Amy Silvano 08sept05

Not sure if this species should be included in the middle of large waterbodies. Current model limits them to within 500m of shore. I removed hand modeling-no need based on notes and model parameters. MJR 17aug07.

references.B88ROO01NAUS: Root, T. 1988. Atlas of wintering North American birds:An analysis of Christmas Bird Count data. University of Chicago Press. 336 pp.
references.W02BRU02USGP: Brua, Robert B. 2002. Ruddy Duck (Oxyura jamaicensis), The Birds of North America Online (A. Poole, Ed.). Ithaca: Cornell Lab of Ornithology; Retrieved from the Birds of North America Online: http://bna.birds.cornell.edu/bna/species/696.
references.B83AOU01USGP: American Ornithologists' Union (AOU). 1983. Check-list of North American Birds, 6th edition. Allen Press, Inc., Lawrence, Kansas. 877 pp.
references.B90SIB02NAUS: Sibley, C.G., and B.L. Monroe. 1990. Distribution and taxonomy of birds of the world. Yale University Press, New Haven, Connecticut. xxiv + 1111 pp.
references.B80BEL01NAUS: Bellrose, F. C. 1980. Ducks, geese and swans of North America. Stackpole Books, Harrisburg, Pennsylvania. 540 pp.
references.A89WOO01NAUS: Woodin, M. C., and G. A. Swanson. 1989. Foods and dietary strategies of prairie-nesting ruddy ducks and redheads. Condor 91:280-287.
references.B66GOD01NAUS: Godfrey, W.E. 1966. The birds of Canada. National Museums of Canada. Ottawa. 428 pp.
references.W02BRU01USGP: Brush, Timothy and John W. Fitzpatrick. 2002. Great Kiskadee (Pitangus sulphuratus), The Birds of North America Online (A. Poole, Ed.). Ithaca: Cornell Lab of Ornithology; Retrieved from the Birds of North America Online: http://bna.birds.cornell.edu/bna/species/622.
references.B76BEL01NAUS: Bellrose, F.C. 1976. Ducks, geese and swans of North America. Stackpole Books, Harrisburg, Pa.
references.B80TER01NAUS: Terres, J.K. 1980. The Audubon Society encyclopedia of North American birds. Alfred A. Knopf, New York.
references.B78HAR01NAUS: Harrison, C. 1978. A field guide to the nests, eggs and nestlings of North American birds. Collins, Cleveland, Ohio.
references.B86HIL01NAUS: Hilty, S.L., and W.L. Brown. 1986. A guide to the birds of Colombia. Princeton University Press, Princeton, New Jersey. 836 pp.
